channel.title: Extras on The WebDev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Extras on The WebDev Blog

item.title: FAQs
item.description: This page is going to act as a sort of Frequently Asked Questions. I expect the numbers of questions to grow as I get more feedback from you, the reader. 1. How does the Blog work? Easy, read every page and follow along with the tutorials, answer the quizzes and do the projects. My email direction is in the next page, so feel free to contact me if:

item.title: Collaborating
item.description: You can help the blog in many diferent ways, but for now I’ll just list three of them: Sharing: Spread the word and share this blog with your friends, family or with someone that you think could benefit from this resource. Feedback: Send me a mail at CodeKommissar@Gmail.com and tell me what you think of the site (what things you like like/dislike, what could be improved, what topics you’d like to see here, etc)
